title: Fight
lyrics:
We went across the line
Starting to divide
We might fall apart
But we'll get closer again
Come on just take your time

I'll be by your side

Whenever you want to go on



I'm waiting

I'm taking it all

We're breaking

But we can save it now



I'm waiting for you

I'm counting on you

'Cause I wanna fight for our love

Yeah, we gotta fight for our love



I'm waiting for you

I'm counting on you

'Cause I wanna fight for our love

We gotta fight for our love

I'm waiting for you

I'm counting on you

'Cause I wanna fight for our love

We gotta fight for our love



We gotta keep in mind

What we sacrificed

We might fall out of love

But we can be one once again



Let's give it a try

We can find a light

Wherever we're going



I'm waiting

Until we save it somehow



I'm waiting for you

I'm counting on you

'Cause I wanna fight for our love

Yeah, we gotta fight for our love

I'm waiting for you

I'm counting on you

'Cause I wanna fight for our love

We gotta fight for our love



We fell in love and now we fall out

But I'm fighting, we gotta fight for love

We flew up and now we come down

But I'm fighting, we gotta fight for love

And I won't stop unless we give it a try

And I'll go on…



…waiting for you

Counting on you

'Cause I wanna fight for our love

We gotta fight for our love



I'm waiting for you

I'm counting on you

'Cause I wanna fight for our love

We gotta fight for our love

I'm waiting for you

I'm counting on you

'Cause I wanna fight for our love

(I wanna fight for our love)

We gotta fight for our love

I'm waiting for you

(I'm waiting for you and I'm counting on you now)

'Cause I wanna fight for our love

We gotta fight for our love
